Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Cross and the Commemoration of King Constantine and Queen Helen:

Text.Language: Hiten nieu,/ n~te pa[oic p~ouro Kwctantinoc nem ?~lan/ tefmau ]ourw: P[oic a~rih~mot nan m~pi,w e~bol n~te nennobi.
Through the prayers of my lord King Constantine and his mother Queen Helen: O Lord, grant us the forgiveness of our sins.
